statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 4 , -x^{3} - 23 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x , 10 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} - 17 \, x + 14 , -2 \, x^{3} + 18 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 4 , -4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 6\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
